name: Ambihextrous
description:
Story
In a world full of magic and sorcery, most mages can only cast a few spells, and need all of their focus and effort to cast just one at a time. You are a aspiring student of a wizarding academy, and are regarded a prodigy as you are able to cast two spells at once by using each hand, and already are able to cast ten. 

Now, exam period is upon you, and must complete tree trials and a duel with another mage to graduate the academy. But beware, as some fear your power, and may try to stop you!

How to play
WASD to move.
Spacebar to jump.
Left Shift to dash a short distance.
Mouse movement to control direction and aim.
Cycle through spells with 1-5 for the left hand and 6-0 for the right hand.
Fire spells with left and right click.

Credits
This is a project created by Dustin W. and Mathew C. for our Game Design and Development 1  class, and game expo- taking place on December 3rd, 2022.
